# Contents

The repository contains all the material of the RETREAT 2024 of the [GRBIO](https://grbio.upc.edu/en) research group.

-   You can find the program: [HERE](Programa%20X%20GRBIO%20RETREAT%202025.pdf)

-   A direct link to the repository web page: [HERE](https://github.com/GRBio/RETREAT2025)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

The folders with the different presentations of the sessions can be found here:

Sessió 1: **Kick-off**

-   [Opertura i Presentació del Retreat (Lupe Gómez)](01_kick_off/01_RETREAT2025_Presentació_GuadalupeG.pdf)
-   [Twitter, Newsletter i XXSS (Daniel Fernández)](01_kick_off/02_RETREAT2025_XXSS_DanielF.pdf)
-   [Contingut Web i Servidors (Jordi Cortés)](01_kick_off/03_RETREAT2025_Web_Content_JordiC.pdf)
-   [GRBIO Divulga (Conxita Arenas)](01_kick_off/04_RETREAT2025_GRBIO_Divulga_ContxitaA.pdf)
-   [Seminaris (Ferran Reverter)](01_kick_off/05_RETREAT2025_Seminars_FerranR.pdf)

Sessió 2: **Doctorandes**

-   [Statistical Methods for Hierarchical Crossover Data With Pain Related PRO’s (Pau Esteve)](02_PhD_Students/01_GRBIO_retreat_Pau.pdf)
-   [Enhanced validation of tabular Synthetic Data: assessing Propensity Score Resemblance Metrics (Nora Amama)](02_PhD_Students/02_GRBIO_retreat_Nora.pdf)
-   [Generate Synthetic Data with Archetypal Analysis (Liukuan Yu)](02_PhD_Students/03_GRBIO_retreat_Welk.pdf)
-   [Methods for multi-stage designs with survival data and informative censoring (Maria Lee)](02_PhD_Students/04_GRBIO_retreat_Maria.pdf)

Sessió 3: **Recerca Viva**

-   [Differential Network Analysis (DNA): An overview (Antonio Miñarro)](03_Senior_Session/01_GRBIO_retreat_ToniMiñarro.pdf)
-   [Assurance and power-like friends in group-sequential designs (Marta Bofill)](03_Senior_Session/02_GRBIO_retreat_Marta.pdf)
-   [GofCens package: Goodness-of-fit methods for complete and right-censored data (Klaus Langohr)](03_Senior_Session/03_GRBIO_retreat_Klaus.pdf)

Sessió 4: **Presentació taller d'Infografies i Llampecs**

Sessió 5: **Taller GRBIO Divulga**

-   [Taller de propostes per al GRBIO Divulga](GRBIO_Divulga.pdf)

Sessió 5: **Activitat lúdica**
